hey guys. forgive me for being a complete retard, but what do i do with all these files once iv downloaded them?

Captain: In the folder that you have downloaded, scroll down until the end and find the last .rar file. Then using winzip or some other zip file program extract that last files contents ("Extract Here" is often the option--right clicking on the file often brings up the extraction options). The file will unzip all the others and give you a .avi file or whatever which you can watch with VLC or other program. Good luck. (PS: I don't think it really matters what file you extract/unzip -- they will all combine to give you a watchable movie).

This is really amazing stuff! And yeah, got the screeching sound also. Scary shit.

It's not about whether or not we're capable of un-raring it (duh!) it's the fact that we have to keep two copies of everything we download - or not seed ("Please Seed back" - yeah, right!)  Plus that fact the if there's several episodes inside and we only need one of them we have to download the whole thing to be able to extract it. So...it's inconvenient, it discourages seeding, it wastes everybody's time, in a word... RETARDED!!! (or RARTARDED if you prefer)
